title: Legal-Safe Logging
why: Agar tum personal data ko logs me dump kar dete ho to privacy violation hoti hai. Logging ka aim debugging aur observability hota hai, not tracking users.
checklist: Log errors, request method, path, status code, and timing.
Do NOT log phone numbers, passwords, cookies, tokens, or personal identifiers.
Logs ko 30-90 din ke andar auto delete karo (retention policy).
Sensitive data ko hash/anonymize karo agar debugging zaruri ho.
